issue.title: [CF 142] Cooldowns of trinkets and objects
issue.body:
This addon has become indispensable for me, but I still miss a feature (or perhaps it exists and I can't find it). I'd like to be able to track the CD time of trinkets and other objects, such as potions.

Thanks for your work!!


> Posted by CurseForge user Furymurk | Imported from CurseForge issue #142 | Raw

comments.body:
When you choose cooldown, in the options you can choose the cooldown to be either a spell or an item.

However I'd like to ad that I wish the item cooldown would not show if the item is not in the inventory. In my mage I use it to track mana gem cooldown, showing me the icon when the mana gem is available, it works great until I run out of charges, then the icon remains visible where I'd like it to not show because well, I can't use it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Beruchan

Thank you! I think the problem is with the Spanish translation, because it says 'Elemento' instead of 'Objeto'.


> Posted by CurseForge user Furymurk

The Spanish translations came from Google translate a while back. If you would like to fix this, and/or contribute more/better translations, go here: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/localization/


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
